requirement: The system shall detect and monitor forest fires in the US and Canada and provide the forest fire data in near real time to the Fire Department.

requirement: The system shall perform its mission by providing observation data, maintaining operations including communication with ground, controlling trajectory, separating from the launch vehicle, launching the spacecraft, and deploying mechanisms, while mitigating failures upon fault detection during execution.
